dialogues.text: As if suddenly remembering something he looks from the ca to the cat, who is busy cleaning himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He shakes the thought from his mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hal lifts the seat and unbuckles his pants.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He stares at the ceiling with half closed eyes. The inevitable sound of urine hitting water starts. A content look washes over his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is a distinct sound of porcelain CRACKING and SPLINTERING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sound intensifies. Hal looks down to see his URINE ST SMASHING THE TOILET.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL (CONT'D) Oh, God!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He whips his stream away only to cut a LONG RIP IN THE WA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL (CONT'D) Oh, God!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He freaks out and begins to lose control of his flow as i destroys everything he accidently aims at; the bathroom mirror, a bottle of cheap cologne, the bathroom window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL (CONT'D) Oh, God!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He aims back for the toilet, which is pretty much rubble to see the floor give way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finally, the pee stops and he glances down the hole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sees his downstairs NEIGHBOR sitting at his breakfast table. He has a fork halfway to his mouth as he stares at smashed toilet on his pancakes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hal turns the corner to see his bus pulling away from the stop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL Wait!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He starts running after it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL (CONT'D) Whoa, whoa, whoa!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unable to stop, he SLAMS INTO THE BACK OF THE BUS and fal back to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the bus continues on he sees an INDENTATION of his tor right below the rear window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stunned, to say the least, he rises to his feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something's not right here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He slaps himself in the face as hard as he can.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wake up! Wake up, Hal!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hal spins around to see a car barreling toward him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He goes to jump out of the way - ZOOM - he FLIES TWO STOR UP, nails a building and comes crashing back down to the sidewalk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hal sits up, disheveled and scared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, okay. Let's get it together, man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He closes his eyes in an attempt to will back his sanity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is just some sort of...episode. It will pass, it will pass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He opens his eyes and looks down the street. A BEAUTIFUL NAKED WOMAN is coming toward him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, not too fast I hope.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As she passes him and turns the corner out of his view he catches ANOTHER NAKED WOMAN - an old disgusting one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, fast, fast!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns away from her in horror only to see AN ENTIRE BL OF NAKED PEOPLE going about their business.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He rubs his eyes and looks down the street again. Everyon has returned to a clothed state.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He relaxes a little until he looks down and notices that floating a foot off the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think I need to go home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hal's front door CREAKS as it slowly opens, revealing Mas Mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He walks over to the bathroom and smiles to himself as he notices the giant hole in the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Welcome to your second birth, Hal Stewart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind continues to survey the room. He stops to loo over a "KARATE KID" POSTER on Hal's living room wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He focuses on the majestic image of Pat Morita teaching a young Ralph Macchio to kick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Instruction is very important in the formative years. Every hero needs a mentor, a father figure to look up to.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He presses his special watch, causing his body to MORPH I THE SPITTING-IMAGE OF PAT MORITA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perfect.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hal enters, grabs a bottle of vodka from atop of the frid and takes a long pull from it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VOICE (O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A man will usually find that if he drinks from a bottle, eventually, the bottle drinks from him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hal does a SPIT TAKE. In the corner a darkened figure sta

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who are you!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VOICE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am the guide on your journey. Fate has chosen you to be it's champion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pat Morita steps out from the shadows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hal passes out again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We are close on Hal's face as his eyes flutter open. He appears to be lying on the couch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hunches up on his elbows, looks around, but everything as it seems.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He lays his head back down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank God. It was a dream. Man, I must be losing it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A voice sounds right next to his ear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA" (O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know you're out of orange juice?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hal leaps up to find he's been resting his head on Pat's

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus! This isn't happening, this isn't happening.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hal backs away and trips over a box.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Calm. All things must be filtered through calmness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bullshit! Sometimes it's best to freak out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think we must work on your attitude first.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look I'm gonna call the cops in about two seconds if you don't get out of here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pat rises and walks to Hal. He's so calm it makes Hal cal

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you calm now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, I'm okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pat slaps him across the face hard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good, because we've got a lot of work to do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hal grabs his jaw.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell was that for?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rule number one: expect the unexpected.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you just tell me what this is all about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The heavens are not in the habit of bestowing a gift such as this to just anyone. You are being rewarded for being a man of great moral fortitude with an unwavering belief in humanity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's me alright.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am to train you so you may fulfill your destiny to defeat the great menace to Metro City: Master Mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pat gets up and walks toward the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA" (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're are we going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To train.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pat is sitting in the driver's seat. The car is bumping u and down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Strength is just as much in the mind as it is the muscle. Remember, both need to be exercised.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We PULL BACK to see Hal lifting the car up over his head. He's hardly straining.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pat leans on the HORN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, Corky? You listening?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two highly attractive female joggers run by. They're clea impressed with Hal's show of strength. He smiles and mout "hello."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, work both muscles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pat cocks back the chamber of a .357 MAGNUM. He holds it and carefully takes aim...at Hal's chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trust me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An invulnerability test. Something wrong?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh...yeah. I would prefer not to get shot. Do not fire that thing!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frustrated, Pat lowers the gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're bulletproof.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, do you know that for sure?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pat quickly aims and fires.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hal lets out a high pitched scream as the bullet ricochet off his chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I do now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hal looks down at his chest, not so much as a scratch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You suck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hal is in the air flying in a sitting position. He's weav back and forth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ice Man, I got a bogie on my tail. Two Russian Migs coming in hard and fast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hal looks down to see Pat Morita yelling at him from the of a building down below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did I tell you? Stomach down, hands up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hal sighs and assumes the proper superhero in-flight position.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: God, I feel so gay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pat's CELL PHONE begins to RING. He answers it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA" (in Master Mind voice)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pat panics. He looks up to make sure no one is in earshot

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sees Hal now doing somersaults in the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pat turns his attention back to the phone, talking in his John Cusack voice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA" (in Cusack voice)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, it's John Cusack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi, it's Roxanne. Listen, I...I really enjoyed talking with you the other day.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...As did I.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great. God, I feel really silly, and if you have a lot going on I totally understand. But, I was wondering if you maybe wanted to have lunch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He can't believe what he's hearing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA" (excited)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'd love to!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He quickly recovers his composure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA" (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I mean, I AM a little hungry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great. How does the park sound, around noon-ish?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great, see you then.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pat hangs up the phone and returns it to his pocket as Ha lands behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHOOOOA! Man, that is so cool. It's like fly - Oh my God, I almost said it was like flying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For the rest of the day I want you to continue to practice your flying posture.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why, where're ya going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...To do something...mysterious ...and Asian.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Say no more, bro. I'll just keep at it, then.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John Cusack and Roxanne eat WRAPPED SANDWICHES while walk through Metro City Park.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How's your sandwich?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "JOHN CUSACK"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's quite delicious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hope you don't think I'm too forward. Some men are intimidated when a woman asks them out. I just find you really easy to talk to.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "JOHN CUSACK"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, you're not at all like you are in the movies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "JOHN CUSACK"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. I don't know - You have this strange, refined way of speaking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "JOHN CUSACK"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I do? That is most interesting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anyway, when we were talking the other day I just felt, even though we only talked for a couple of hours, that we've known each other for years.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "JOHN CUSACK"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know just what you mean.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxanne bites into her sandwich.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what? This sandwich is disgusting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She tosses it in a nearby garbage can.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course I already ate half of it. I wonder what that says about my character?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "JOHN CUSACK"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It means you don't give up on a sandwich. You see that it has potential, and you give it every chance to be all it can be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxanne smiles at his analogy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks, but knowing me, I was probably projecting my expectations of what a lunch should be on the sandwich. It might have been okay at first, but I just made it bitter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John Cusack notices Roxanne's smile starting to fade.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "JOHN CUSACK"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that what happened with your last sandwich - I mean, boyfriend?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When I look back, I probably shouldn't of expected so much from him. He was already a giving person. You know, one of those go out and save the world types.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "JOHN CUSACK"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've run into a few.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was selfish, I guess. I didn't want to share him with anybody else.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "JOHN CUSACK"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It sounds like he was a special man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They broke the mold.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John Cusack arches his eyebrow in a very familiar manner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "JOHN CUSACK"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perhaps not.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hal walks up to Pat Morita sporting a Lone Ranger-type ma and wearing a purple and red superhero costume. It's not unlike Uberman's except for a giant "T" on his chest. (Fr here on, Hal is referred to as TITAN)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's the "T" stand for?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that supposed to mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's from Roman mythology. Zeus's father...oh, just go with it. You look perfect.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't think this mask is big enough. Are you sure no one is gonna recognize me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's fine, just don't slouch. It's all in the posture.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He grabs Titan's shoulders like a proud papa.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA" (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is a long line of people snaked around the velvet ropes. They're all waiting for their chance at the one op teller window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Four men wearing BEATLES MASKS(JOHN,PAUL,GEORGE,AND RINGO CARRYING SHOTGUNS enter the bank.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John fires a shot in the air, sending everyone into an immediate panic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JOHN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright folks, this is a robbery. Nobody moves - yadda, yadda, yadda...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ringo jumps over the teller wall and starts stuffing bill into a bag.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As John and Paul cover the crowd, George goes to the corn office and puts a gun to the BANK MANAGER'S head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GEORGE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The safe. Let's go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BANK MANAGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, just don't hurt anyone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GEORGE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: George leads him out by the collar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CRASH - Titan smashes through the window and lands in a b superhero stance with hands on hips.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, boys, there's no need for all this just to get the free toaster.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Paul cocks his gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PAUL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you suppose to be?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We move in for a nice dramatic close up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Justice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GEORGE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, justice, suck on this...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: George, John and Paul open fire on Titan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He just stands there and yawns as the bullets bounce off

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With their guns empty the three just stare at him in amazement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now it's my turn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns to George.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, George, here comes the sun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan grabs George and throws him into a fluorescent ligh fixture in the ceiling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Paul tries to run for the door. Titan snatches the collar his jacket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Say, Paul, your mother should know...that you're a scumbag.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He tosses Paul out the window and into a parked DELIVERY TRUCK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan turns around just as John hits him with the butt of shotgun. It instantly breaks apart in his hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan lifts him like a rag doll up into the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John, all you need is love...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He throws John who lands on top of a cubical wall - GROIN FIRST.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and a good urologist.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan effortlessly hops over the teller wall to find Ring cowering on the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He grabs him by the shirt and lifts him up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, Ringo...um...um...you're under arrest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan walks out of the bank with Ringo and George under h arm. He's suddenly swarmed by a group of television reporters, including Roxanne.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Across the street is Pat Morita. He watches Titan's first news conference with great anxiety.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BANK MANAGER (to Hal)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On behalf of the First National Bank of Metro City, I'd like to offer you a reward for your act of bravery.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hands Titan a check.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN (reading)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ten thousand dollars!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan looks over to Pat, who violently shakes his head no

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN (CONT'D) (unenthusiastically)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I...can't except this. Law and order is it's own...um...reward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pat gives him the thumbs up. Pat turns, suddenly seeing Roxanne with her camera crew. Captivated, his eyes lock o her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meanwhile, Roxanne and her cameraman, SETH, are maneuveri around the crowd to get closer to Titan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BRAD HELMS (O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not so fast, Roxanne.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They both turn to see Roxanne's reporter rival Brad Helms Geraldo without the class, and his cameraman, FRANK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BRAD HELMS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This story's mine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen, Brad. We were just in the area. I was just trying to -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BRAD HELMS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've been in this business long enough to know pretty well what you were "just trying to do." Besides, I heard you couldn't take the big game anymore and were put on fluff detail?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dejected, Roxanne turns and motions for Seth to turn the camera off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SETH

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not gonna take that from him, are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's right. Old habit, I guess. (to Brad)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll get out of your way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As they walk off, Brad makes a comment to Frank loud enou for her to hear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BRAD HELMS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Besides, I'm sure there's a pancake supper somewhere that needs covering.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see the news conference on the bank's steps. In the co of the screen is written: "recorded earlier."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BRAD HELMS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For months now, since the death of Uberman, the citizens of Metro City have been holding out for a hero. Well, it appears they won't have to hold out for much longer as a new costumed crusader has suddenly stormed onto the scene. Today, at the Metro Savings and Trust, a masked mystery man single-handedly defeated "The Fab Four Gang." Just who is this new caped avenger?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brad holds the microphone to Titan's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BRAD HELMS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sure all of our viewers are now wondering, what's the "T" stand for?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a message to all the scum out there. Uberman may be gone, but Metro City has a new protector, and his name is "Tighten!"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another reporter leans in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REPORTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How do you spell that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We PULL BACK to see Plato and Da Vinci watching this spectacle. Master Mind is sitting with them, reading a NEWSPAPER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (reading paper)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, for heaven's sake. I can't believe it. He misspelled his name.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind holds up the newspaper. The headline reads "Metro's New Hero: Tighten."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No matter, I suppose.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind throws the paper on the floor and begins to p around the room with his arms folded behind his back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've now fully established Titan as Metro City's hero. They will love him just as they loved Uberman. Everything is going according to plan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Einstein leans over and whispers in Plato's ear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EINSTEIN (whispering)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, if the plan is getting us in jail.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind turns around, facing Einstein. He walks over, standing face to face with the rebellious henchmen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, Einstein, maybe I should have called you Socrates. He also didn't know when to keep his thoughts to himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EINSTEIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just fail to see the point in all of this. I mean, why are we creating another superhero when it was such a pain in the ass for you to get rid of the other one? I mean, Uberman is destroyed, we should be using this opportunity to...to...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EINSTEIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know. To take over the weather, space, the world - whatever super villains are SUPPOSED to do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The reason someone like you will always be a minion is because you have no foresight. We take over the earth, like you said. Then what? Women? Cars? Money? Even the grandest treasures will lose their lustre if you don't have someone to hold them over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Einstein throws up his hands. He's had enough. He pulls o his wig and throws it to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EINSTEIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's it! This balance of the force bullshit is getting way too Oprah for me. I'm blowing. Who's with me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You dare?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EINSTEIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, I dare. I'm sick of wearing stupid costumes, and I'm sick of working for a super villain who's turning into a softie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plato and Da Vinci's mouths drop to the floor. They turn Master Mind for his rebuttal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What - did - you - call me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EINSTEIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You heard me. You used to be an inhuman monster, now look at you. You're creating super heroes, you don't go with us on robberies anymore, it's been days since you threatened anyone, oh, and not to mention this Roxanne Ritchi thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THAT is none of your business, knave!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EINSTEIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, you guys haven't sealed the deal yet, have you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silence!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EINSTEIN (In a woman's voice)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, Master, your head is so big.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm warning you, Einstein.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EINSTEIN (In a woman's voice)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I said silence!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With his metal gauntlet Master Mind grabs Einstein by the throat and lifts him into the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Einstein looks frightened as he tries to pry himself free Master Mind's grip.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind's eyes soften as if his heart is suddenly not into what he's about to do. He let's Einstein drop to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get out of my sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxanne and John Cusack are eating on the outside patio o fancy restaurant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't get me wrong, I love being a reporter. I don't think I could do anything else. It's the consequences of what we do that I'm having a problem with.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He listens intently as he refills her glass with wine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "JOHN CUSACK"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's where journalistic responsibility comes in, no?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's supposed to.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "JOHN CUSACK"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sounds to me like you're running from something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got someone I cared about killed. If it wasn't for me, he wouldn't have been involved.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John suddenly gets a disturbed look in his eye, realizing what she's talking about.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He reaches across the table and takes her hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "JOHN CUSACK"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't blame yourself. My father used to say each of us must answer the great call to truly feel alive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Was he an actor?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "JOHN CUSACK"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...No. He was...a landscaper. And a horrible one. I mean he would fail time and time again at his...landscaping. And sometimes he'd get pretty beaten up or thrown in jail -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jail?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "JOHN CUSACK"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My point is he took the good with the bad. He grew a little each time. Improved, learned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Was he ever successful?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "JOHN CUSACK"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: God, no...but don't let deter you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxanne LAUGHS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks for this. You know, this is embarrassing, but it's been a long time since I -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's starting to lightly sprinkle. Roxanne looks up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think it's starting to rain. We might want to find a table inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "JOHN CUSACK"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What were you gonna say?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, I was gonna say...It's been a long time since...well, I've been with someone I...enjoy being with.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John Cusack smiles warmly and raises his glass for a toas

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "JOHN CUSACK"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To people who enjoy being with each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They go to clang glasses, when the rain suddenly causes J Cusack's disguise generator to short.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His true form of Master Mind is briefly revealed to Roxan as a BOLT OF ELECTRICITY encircles his body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxanne drops her glass and jumps out of her seat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, no. Don't look at me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LIKE A BROKEN TV the image keeps switching between MASTER MIND AND JOHN CUSACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Master Mind starts to franticly slap at his watch, the Cusack disguise begins to hold steady.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He nonchalantly returns to cutting his steak.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "JOHN CUSACK"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, never mind that. Now, where were we?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxanne grabs his glass and throws the drink in his face, causing the generator to short out permanently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind now sits in his true blue form.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my God.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not gonna get all freaky about this, are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This...this is too much, even for you. God, I go out with you, tell you my innermost thoughts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I only did this because I wanted to talk to you on the same level. You know, without all the baggage?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baggage? You burned my boyfriend alive, you sick son-of-a-bitch!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You see, that's exactly what I'm talking about.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxanne starts to walk away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxanne!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay away from me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind sinks back down to his chair. Despite the now heavy rain bombarding him, he returns to his food.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Several resturaunt patron's are looking at him through th window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our villain turns to them, giving them a villainous glare

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind is lying on his back, wide awake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (mumbling to himself)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stupid. What was I thinking? Plato, it's his fault. He's the one who sent me on this weak-willed path. I'll filet his scrotum for this. Me, a creature of evil, in love with Roxanne Ritchi. Preposterous. I hardly give such matters thought

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He rolls onto his side. He yawns and closes his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, they shoot back open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind pulls up in a blue Rolls Royce, across the st from Roxanne's apartment

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He stares up at the building, hoping to catch a glimpse o her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finally, she appears, primping her hair in her apartment window's reflection.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I should just go up there and just lay it all out to her. "Roxanne, I like you - I always have. Oh, and I'm sorry I blew up your ex. (realizing the absurdity of his words) Yeah, that would go over like a pants-less clown at a child's birthday party. What the hell am I even doing here? Who cares what she thinks? I'm a supervillain and here I am acting like a love struck schoolboy. Forget this. I control my own destiny!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns the ignition key - NOTHING HAPPENS. He repeats b gets the same results.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D) (disgusted)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perfect.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She pulls a pack of smokes off her night stand. Empty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She grabs her long coat and throws it over her robe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxanne steps outside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please be open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Across the street is a liquor store. The light is still o

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank God.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She walks across the street, passing in front of Master Mind's car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spotting her, he sinks down in his seat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxanne walks by, totally unaware of his presence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Relieved, Master Mind sits back up and watches her go int the store.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxanne walks up to an elderly Korean SHOPKEEPER at the counter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A pack of Lady Strikes, please.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind is talking on his cell phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello, Triple A?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He suddenly spots something across the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A HOODLUM walks up to the entrance of the store and pulls a gun from under his coat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind stares in shock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll call you back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hangs up the phone and watches the Hoodlum go inside t store.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Hoodlum reaches across the counter and grabs a fist f of cash from the register.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SHOPKEEPER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SHOTGUN HOODLUM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut up, Gramps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns to Roxanne, spotting a GOLD NECKLACE around her neck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SHOTGUN HOODLUM (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gimme that necklace!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't think so.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Hoodlum cocks his shotgun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SHOTGUN HOODLUM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I said give it to me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lady said no.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hoodlum turns around to see Master Mind in the doorwa holding a STRANGE-LOOKING HAND CANNON (GOO GUN) with knob and blinking lights.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hoodlum starts to laugh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SHOTGUN HOODLUM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell's that? A super soaker?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, it's a goo gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hoodlum turns his gun to Master Mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SHOTGUN HOODLUM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, what's it do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It goos.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind fires the cannon. It instantly covers the sto in a cloud of SMOKE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The smoke clears to reveal the hoodlum STUCK TO THE WALL, covered in a thick, GREEN GUNK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxanne stares at him, dumbfounded.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's...a prototype.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind starts to walk out when he's suddenly confron by the shopkeeper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SHOPKEEPER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know you! You Master Brain guy. You a hero.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind points the goo gun at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't - EVER - say that again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind walks out with the cannon resting on his shou like he's a short timer in Da Nang. Roxanne follows short behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind turns around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you following me or something?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't flatter yourself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns away and continues walking. Roxanne runs in fron him blocking his way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't walk away from me when I'm talking to you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finally it occurs to her what's going on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What a minute...all that stuff you use to say to me when Uberman was alive - about me being the loyal queen by your side as you rule over Metro City. That wasn't just super villain rhetoric, was it? You actually meant it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My, someone has a rather high opinion of themselves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They stare at each other in silence, their glares locked conflict.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE (coldly)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you really think I would be with someone like you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This stings Master Mind to the bone. And after a brief contemplation, he reaches the only logical, painful conclusion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With that, Master Mind exits into the night, leaving Roxa with a baffled expression on her face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind enters in a huff. Da Vinci closes the door be him as Plato notices his master's agitated state.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PLATO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everything alright, sir?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind GRABS PLATO BY THE GROIN with his metal gaunt causing Plato's eyes to bulge in pain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (overly calm)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fine, why do you ask?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PLATO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You...just...seem...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind tightens his grip.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PLATO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...distracted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind releases him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just with business, my minion. Just with business. I've decided it is time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PLATO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, we've created our hero, now it's time to give him a little motivation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DA VINCI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How do we do that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To be simply good is not enough. A hero must be driven by an almost relentless desire to right a wrong that can never be corrected.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PLATO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, he must lose someone near and dear to him - his father figure. Gentlemen, it's time for Operation Mentor Kill!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan flies high over and through the city, under bridges between buildings, etc. He's not really working, just enjoying himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A PRETTY WOMAN sits at her makeup table wearing nothing b her bra and panties. Through the reflection in her mirror see a large window directly behind her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As she applies lipstick we see Titan fly quickly by in th background. After a moment he slowly slides back in view begins ogling the girl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She sees him in the mirror and quickly covers herself wit robe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan tries to hide his face as he zooms off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan looks down to see an APARTMENT BUILDING IN RUIN. Emergency lights flash around it as swarms of people run around in chaos.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Man, what the hell happened down there? Wait a sec -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He stops in mid-air as he comes to the striking realizati

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan lands in front of the rubble that was once his home Reporters stand just beyond the police line.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Crap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From the wreckage crawls a dying Pat Morita.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan goes and kneels beside Pat, holding him in his arms

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm dying, kid. There is just one last lesson I have for you. It is the most important of all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind did this, you must avenge me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind? Why?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "PAT MORITA"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because he's evil. You must stop the evil Hal - stop the...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pat's body goes limp.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cameras begin to pop and flash around them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan gently lays Pat's body down and stands respectfully over him. The reporters rush over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REPORTER 1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tighten, Is this the work of Master Mind?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REPORTER 2

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How will the death of your mentor affect your resolve?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REPORTER 3

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Was that Pat Morita?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan walks up to one of the cameras.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This injustice will not go unpunished. Master Mind, if you can hear me, Tighten is coming for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the background we see Plato and Da Vinci, DRESSED AS PARAMEDICS, load pat's body onto a stretcher.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PLATO ACCIDENTALLY DROPS HIS SIDE. As he bends down to pi it back up, Pat quickly slaps him, then goes back to play dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind and the boys prepare the fortress for Hal's revenge attack. Master Mind is as giddy as a schoolboy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, people, we don't have much time. Titan should be here any minute, so let's get the lead out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is a GIANT MOUNTED DEATH RAY in the middle of the h being tinkered with by Da Vinci.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How's the death ray coming?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DA VINCI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nearly up to full power, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hum. Let's turn it down a few notches. It's his first time and we don't want to get in a lucky shot, now do we?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plato enters the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anything on the radar yet?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PLATO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not yet, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I see. Well, he must be planning something big. Are the flame androids deployed?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PLATO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All twelve.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind rubs his hands in anticipation as he sits dow his throne.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wonderful, wonderful. Plato, Da Vinci, take your places next to me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They move to either side of the chair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No slouching.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Da Vinci straightens up and sucks in his gut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They remain this way for several long moments. Master Min occasionally glances at a DIGITAL CLOCK on the wall. Stil Titan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Apparently quite some time has passed. The bold stances h degraded to fatigue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PLATO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's certainly taking his time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He'll be here. That's the way it works.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind reclines in his chair and taps his metal gaun impatiently on the armrest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plato has squatted down, resting his chin on his hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unprofessional, that's what this is. No, it's disrespect for the craft.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind rises and begins to pace back and forth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Would Uberman have kept us waiting like this? Of course not. He was a pro who knew the score. It's time we spelled out a few things for this Titan. I will not be made a fool of.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He storms out of the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan's sitting on the floor in a barren apartment wearin his costume top and some tighty whities. He sips his beer he watches a basketball game on a tiny TV.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Much to his annoyance, there's a KNOCK at the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, for crying out loud.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He gets up and opens the door. It's Master Mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you know who I am?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It takes a few moments to register, but Titan's suddenly excited.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, you're Master Mind. Yeah! You're actually the guy I want to see!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, so NOW you want to get down to it. Well, I want to get a few things off my chest first.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind walks past Titan into the apartment. He spins around, pointing at him accusingly with one of his metal fingers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of all the inconsiderate - Do you have any idea how long we waited for you? We're you even planning on coming to me and getting revenge?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan shuts the apartment door, and turns back toward his guest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, at first I was going to. You know, because that's what I figured I was supposed to do. But then I got to thinking-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (interrupting)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -You got to thinking? There's nothing to think about. I'm the villain. I do something bad, you come and get me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - I got to thinking...what's the point?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind throws up his hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe you're right. What's the point?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He suddenly notices something in the corner of his eye. H walks over to a futon in the living room. On top of it is

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are these?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's what I wanted to talk to you about.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (baffled)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where did you get all this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN (proudly)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get this: I stole them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From where?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From all over. You see, once you killed Pat and ruined my other apartment building I was pretty pissed off, so I figured I'd go, find you and kick some ass. Then I thought to myself: "Okay,then what?" I mean, if we were to fight, what would I get out of it? Would I get my apartment back? Would I be able to pay the bills?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, what about your mentor?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell you the truth? He was kind of a dick. I mean, being a hero is dandy and all, but it's volunteer work. Now you've always had the right take on all this. I mean, when you rob a bank or take over the diamond exchange you get something out of it. I mean, when you don't get caught, which, no offense, isn't very often. And that brings me to what I wanted to propose to you: Who could catch you if I'm by your side?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perplexed by his proposal, Master Mind just stares at Tit awe-struck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want to team-up?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You got the brains, I got the brawn. We could even call ourselves that: `Brain' and `Brawn'. Look at this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan picks up a piece of POSTER BOARD off the floor and shows it to Master Mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I even designed us some new costumes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The picture is crudely drawn with magic markers and crayo A big headed man (Master Mind) is standing on a plate of grass in a blue costume with a picture of a brain on his chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Next to him, is a picture of Titan in a red costume with black cape, but his chest is mysteriously blank.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan proudly points to the two figures.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See, you'd be brain, so you got a little one on your costume, and then I'll have brawn on mine...once I figure out the best, you know, visual interpretation of it. What do you think?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do I think?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind shakes his head tiredly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think you're probably the biggest idiot I've ever met. I mean, I can't believe you. All your gifts, all your powers, and all you want to use them for is your own financial fulfillment. You know what? Your kind of people make me sick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan puts down his drawing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I worked hard on this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh - gee - I am so sorry!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind looks to Heaven in disgust.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D) (under his breath)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of all the people to pick, it had to be this loser.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This strikes a cord with Titan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now, hold on. You're going a little too far.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wish your mother said that to your father the night of your conception, they would have saved me a whole lot of heartache.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, I mean it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind gets right in his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, yeah? What are you gonna do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see Master Mind's body CRASH through the building and in a DUMPSTER across the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A car pulls up. The driver's door opens. Da Vinci gets ou and runs to help his master.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DA VINCI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It hurts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Da Vinci peeks into the dumpster to see Master Mind's bod cushioned by a stack of trash bags.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DA VINCI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What hurts?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The overly large henchmen starts to pull his master from dumpster when they suddenly hear a voice from above. It's Titan peeking through the hole in his apartment wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't need you, I don't need anybody. I have the power to do and take anything I want. And now, I'm gonna take back everything this city owes me. Beware Metro City, it's time for Titan to collect.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan shoots up into the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, and from now on - I'M GONNA FLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He takes a sitting position and flies away as if he were piloting an invisible jet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind climbs out of the dumpster and watches Titan disappear into the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DA VINCI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How'd the plan go, boss?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just made myself redundant, old friend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Da Vinci gives Master Mind a whiff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DA VINCI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not that bad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan, with a happy bounce in his step, enters the bank. last time he was here he thwarted a robbery. He looks nostalgic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SECURITY GUARD shyly walks up to him like a kid meeting TV idol.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SECURITY GUARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morning, Tighten.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SECURITY GUARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is there something we can do for you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN Oh, don't bother about me. I'm just here to make a withdrawal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan walks across the lobby, drawing stares of admiratio from all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A little girl waves to him sweetly. He gives her a good- natured WINK as he heads straight for the vault.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The security guard watches him enter and come out with a OF CASH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure he must be misunderstanding what's going on, the security guard just stares at Titan as he passes by and o the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The bank manager comes over to the guard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BANK MANAGER Say, did he just rob us?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SECURITY GUARD Not sure. Sort of looks it, don't it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BANK MANAGER Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SECURITY GUARD Should I, you know, stop him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BANK MANAGER Umm...Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the security guard exits the bank, the manager stares the window. His eyes suddenly grow wide with terror.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The guard's body suddenly smashes through the window, lan at the startled bank manager's feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BANK MANAGER (CONT'D) (looking down at the guard) He did rob us, didn't he?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "A Channel 7 News Special Report." Brad Helms wipes into view.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BRAD HELMS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Absolute power corrupts absolutely." When Lord Acton stated that, in a letter to Bishop Mandell Creighton in 1887, no one thought much about it, but today Metro City is reeling from that very prophecy. Tighten, who many thought of as our savior, has turned his back on the cause of justice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan flies through the window of the building. He emerge seconds later laughing with his shirt full of booty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A woman screams from the window of a BURNING BUILDING. Ti flies up to her, grabs her fur coat and zooms off again, leaving the woman behind, slightly confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan steals a little boy's lollipop and gooses his mothe

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dozens of people run through the streets apparently to ge out of a downpour. We cut to the top of a building and se Titan ZIPPING UP HIS PANTS and laughing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind paces back and forth in front of Plato and Da Vinci.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PLATO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't understand it. He seemed to have every characteristic we were looking for in a superhero.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, there's no use crying about it now, we must take action. I'm not going to play second fiddle to that crass buffoon. We must destroy Tighten.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PLATO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It won't be easy. Uberman had a sense of decency and genuine love for the people. That was his weakness and was easily used against him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, but he possesses the same flaws present in Uberman's DNA - copper. It's like Benjamin Franklin always said: "If something works don't dick with it."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It looks like a war zone passed through here. Smashed pol cars and debris lay everywhere. This seems to be the only building left untouched.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A very tipsy Titan is sitting at the bar, looking deep in the bottom of his beer glass for answers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can have anything I want. I'm like a god.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The BARTENDER just listens as he wipes down a glass with dirty rag.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Point to any woman in this bar. I could have her in a second.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He follows the bartender's gaze to THE ONLY OTHER PERSON THERE - A passed out, MIDDLE AGED HAG OF A BARFLY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN (to Old Barfly)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, you wanna get with this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BARTENDER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Buddy, what do you want?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan carefully considers this for a moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you want? That's the question, isn't it. I mean, what do you want when you can have everything? (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN(cont'd)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I suppose what I really want is to never be forgotten again. I want to do something that can never be cast aside or one-upped. I want a - what's it called? - A legacy. I want a legacy. Yeah, that's it. I like the sound that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BARTENDER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I meant, what do you want to drink?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan stumbles out of the bar, carrying a large sack of money.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your time has come to an end, Titan!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks up to see Master Mind suddenly standing before h

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There can be only one master criminal in this city - and it's me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan melodramatically throws up his arms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess I should leave town then, huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have a better idea - NOW!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two floors up Da Vinci releases a rope. A COPPER CAGE, li the one that caged Uberman, drops down on top of Titan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan nonchalantly surveys the cage. He walks to the bars tries to pull them apart but can't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's copper my good man. Your one weakness. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND(cont'd)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For all your amazing gifts of brawn you are no match for my intellect.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan thinks for a moment. Suddenly, he starts to SPIN li human top, DRILLING HIMSELF INTO THE STREET BELOW.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As he disappears beneath the surface, we see a shocked lo on Master Mind's face until Titan suddenly explodes out f under the street in front of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind stares up at him, dumbfounded.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan makes like he's going to strike him down, but stops

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what? You're nothing but a bug. Not even worth my effort.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns his back to Master Mind and continues down the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plato makes his way from the shadows to join his master. watch Titan shrink into the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's not as dumb as I thought.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PLATO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess not...Funny, though.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's funny?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PLATO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Funny Uberman didn't think of the same thing.
