dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Titan flies, he looks down at the rooftops of the city below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, something catches his attention.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He stops, hovering in place as he looks down below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The buildings, which make up the heart of downtown Metro, in a PERFECT TRIANGLE with a long strip of street leading to it. It sorta looks like a bowling lane.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello, Legacy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vinnie and his goons come running out as the hear a COMMOTION.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They look up to see Titan ripping off THE GIANT BOWLING B from the top of the establishment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VINNIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, that's my ball!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxanne enters the building's elevator. Just before the d closes an ELDERLY WOMAN slides in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ELDERLY WOMAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was a close one. Sixth floor, please.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxanne smiles and goes to press the button.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The elderly woman suddenly pulls out a SPRAY CAN, shootin MYSTERIOUS-LOOKING MIST into Roxanne's face. She falls to floor unconscious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxanne awakens, finding herself tied to a chair in her living room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hear NOISE from a TV in the background as she tries to adjust her vision.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slowly, the blurry figure before her becomes clear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Master Mind. He sits on her Lazy-Boy, reading what l to be some kind of JOURNAL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow, I always thought Uberman was your first superhero - but it looks like our little Roxanne dated a linebacker in college.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's my diary.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So it is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's personal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, then I wouldn't leave it in your underwear drawer for just anyone to find.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He throws the diary over his shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you want?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need your help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you knock me out and tie me to a chair?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not going to like what I'm about to tell you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As she tries to shake off her headache from being knocked unconscious, Roxanne spots something on the TV.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brad Helms is huddled behind a van.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BRAD HELMS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's chaos here in city square as city police -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behind him, Titan picks up a POLICE CAR and throws it at PADDY WAGON. Both vehicles EXPLODE on impact.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's really out of control.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell me about it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As if finally realizing something, Roxanne looks back at Master Mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I should have known. You have something to do with this, don't you? - With Titan turning evil.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, the evil thing he did by himself. My goal was to give MYSELF purpose by creating an intellectual sparring partner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE (confused)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're talking like you made him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And they call me Master Mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me get this straight. You missed getting your ass kicked, so you made a new guy to kick your ass. That's pathetic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In hindsight...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxanne turns back to the TV to see a group of POLICE OFFICERS open fire on Titan. The bullets just deflect off chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And his powers, they're just like Uberman's. Why would he have his powers?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (almost ashamed)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I had some left over from something. I infused him with it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Driven by rage, she struggles to tear out of her bonds. S finally relents, giving Master Mind a look fueled by pure hatred.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, that's why I decided to tie you up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You did all this because you wanted purpose?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He seemed nice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan is standing on top of a destroyed police car. He wa for the camera to zoom in on him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN Closer. I want to show the people my real face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pulls off his mask, revealing himself as Hal Stewart t the public for the first time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN (CONT'D) Recognize me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE Hal Stewart. He's the guy we thought saved that woman and kid. Turned out he was just trying to save his own ass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND Yeah, good to know - NOW!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan throws the mask over this shoulder and hops off the car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN That's right, I'm really Hal Stewart. Former hero and bowling teacher at Kingpin's Bowling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxanne turns to Master Mind, condescending him with her eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE You picked a bowler to give super powers to?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND It's a modest profession!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With my new found power, I've recently started to wonder what sort of legacy I should leave. Should I be a hero? I tried that once before - even saved a lady and her baby from being squashed. I was treated like a god until everyone started to shit on me - Okay, so what if I didn't "purposely" save them!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He walks over and puts his hand on a large circular concr shape just off camera.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I'm going to make something that can't be taken away from me. I'm going to create a permanent monument to my greatness. One that won't be so easily forgotten or erased.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The camera pulls back revealing THE GIANT CONCRETE BOWLIN BALL from Kingpin's.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I intend to create a new category in the Guinness Book of World's Records by rolling the biggest strike in the history of bowling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He grabs the camera and points it to the DOWNTOWN BUILDIN We realize they are PERFECTLY ALIGNED IN BOWLING PIN FORMATION.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My thanks to the city planning commission. This wouldn't have been possible without them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan grabs the camera so it's pointing back at him again

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell your friends and family to tune in right here to this station at noon tomorrow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My god, he's nuts. That'll destroy the whole business triangle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind seems to be contemplating something - somethi bad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My lair is in the direct path of the ball.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, real nice. Wouldn't want anything to happen to your hideout, would we?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't understand. I have certain equipment that's - that's highly unstable.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I sort of have a hydrogen reactor, okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A HYDROGEN reactor?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's experimental - only one in the world...Well, how do you think I power all my inventions? Someone like me can't pay for electricity. The bills would be outrageous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It creates 100 times the output of a nuclear one...If destroyed it could...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Vaporize the entire city!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (proudly)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pshaw...the whole eastern seaboard, actually. That little baby is amazing. I'm quite proud of it. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND(cont'd) (off her deadpan reaction)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I mean...we'd better find a way to stop him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind thinks a moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did Uberman have a hideout?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A cave, a solitary fortress of some kind. C'mon, all heros have a place to hang their capes up in. Roxanne, it may be our only chance to find something, a clue, anything that could give us a fighting chance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's under his house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whose house?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxanne can hardly believe what she's telling him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne Scott's.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind shoots up out of his chair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne Scott? Uberman was Wayne Scott!? Wayne Scott, the wealthy philanthropist? But he disappeared -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE (interrupting)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He disappeared just over two months ago when you killed him. Not only did you rid the world of a hero, you killed a kind, noble, generous man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perhaps ashamed, the super villain hangs his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind walks behind Roxanne and undoes her bonds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rubbing her wrists, she watches him as he walks over to t door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like you got what you always wanted. Uberman is out of the picture and Metro City is doomed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He grabs the door knob and stops, considering her words.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Metro City doomed." You know, I never thought I'd say something like this, but here it goes -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He slowly turns to her, CUE HEROIC MUSIC.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not if I have anything to say about it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind stands before the huge, Gothic structure in a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Such a dark place for one such as you. I wonder, underneath your noble deeds, what inner demons drove you to your endless crusade for justice?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He walks to the front entrance. The double doors have bee sealed shut with boards and nails. Master Mind begins to them off with his metal hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The doors opens. A beam of moonlight immediately pierces darkness, forming an illuminated path into the heart of t manor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind enters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Covered in dust and cobwebs, the hall looks like a gigant crypt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good lord, man. You've only been dead for two months.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind walks, coming to a gigantic painted PORTRAIT WAYNE SCOTT. He stops to reverently admire the image of h fallen foe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A disguise so simple, it's ingenious. No wonder I never caught on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Besides the Armani suit, there's nothing to hide the fact that this is the same person as Uberman. In the picture, even standing in the same cheesy, heroic pose with his fi on his hips.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two lives, yet in both you were an ideal. Perhaps it was you who was victorious in the end, old friend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A BONGING sound suddenly bellows through the dark halls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind comes to a grandfather clock standing next to gigantic BOOKCASE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the twelfth bong it falls silent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind begins to slide it across the floor until he hears a loud CLICK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The bookcase slides into the wall, REVEALING A HIDDEN PASSAGE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll miss how predictable you were.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The passage way leads Master Mind to a WORKING ESCALATOR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind gets off the escalator to see a long hallway stone walls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He begins to hear strange SOUNDS, almost like MUFFLED SCREAMS, coming from a doorway at the end of the hallway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind starts walking towards it. As he steps closer begins to notice a light cracking through the bottom of t door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello? Anyone here...besides..all the BIG MEN who are with me now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D) (to himself)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's the worst you're gonna find? (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND(cont'd)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The man was a boy scout, not a serial killer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He opens the door to his immediate amazement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's some kind of screening room. A PROJECTOR shoots an i onto A DIRTY WHITE SCREEN hanging on the wall. BEER CANS litter the floor; a table in front of a ripped-up couch i covered in discarded snack goods; and a Kiss Pinball mach stands in the far corner next to a CLOSED DOOR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind turns his attention to the action on the scre

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A woman dressed in a leather DOMINATRIX OUTFIT is whippin overweight man lying on a swing-like device with his butt sticking out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DOMINATRIX IN FILM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She whips him three times. The man CRIES out in pain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FAT MAN IN FILM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind's eyes are transfixed on the disturbing image

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door by the pinball machine suddenly swings open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAYNE SCOTT, dressed in raggedy sweats, steps into the ro carrying a CAN OF BEER and a bowl of JIFFY-POP.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind cannot believe his horrified eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahhhhhh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne Scott is just as startled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAYNE SCOTT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He drop his drink and snack to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two men stare at each other as they struggle to regai their normal breathing patterns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne Scott walks over to the couch, brushes off a thick layer of chip crumbs, and sits down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAYNE SCOTT (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell are you doing here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I might just ask you the same question. I had thought I incinerated you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAYNE SCOTT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You scared the bejesus out of me. How'd you figure out I was still alive? Wait, how do you know my identity!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxanne told me. As for your ruse, I forgot to line the bottom of the copper cage - Somebody pointed that out to me recently. Figured if they could do it, so could you. But one thing I couldn't figure out -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAYNE SCOTT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The skeleton? Something I "borrowed" from a medical school a few months before.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A few months? How long had you been planning this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAYNE SCOTT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I always planned to retire - eventually. I mean, come on, you can't do this sort of thing in your fifties. You'd just look ridiculous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pieces of the puzzle appear to be coming together in Master Mind's head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I see it all so clearly now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind and his minions cover their eyes as the observatory explodes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D - V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You must have done it just seconds before the observatory exploded.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Similar to what Titan did, Uberman bores out from under t cage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D - V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You bore out from under the cage. Then, using your Uber-Speed, -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Running in a blur-like haze, Uberman screeches to a halt front of some bushes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D - V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - you made your way to safety, where you had the skeleton safely hidden away somewhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uberman soars high above the clouds. He looks down at the observatory, which is a mere speck in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D - V.O) (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then you must have flown to a safe distance and waited for the explosion, then...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just as the observatory explodes Uberman aims and throws SKELETON like a javelin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It soars through the air like a missile, tearing through flames of the explosion, and crashing right into the windshield of Master Mind's hydrofoil.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne stares at Master Mind, clearly impressed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAYNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Man, you ARE smart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But why fake your death? Why go through all of it? You could have just quit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAYNE SCOTT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But the responsibility would still be there. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAYNE SCOTT(cont'd)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A cop can retire and stop handing out speeding tickets - but people expect more from superheroes. I tell you, a volcano couldn't erupt in Zimbabwe without everyone expecting me to do something about it. I figured, out of sight, out of mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And Wayne Scott? Why did he have to disappear?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAYNE SCOTT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Both of my lives have so much baggage. It's time for new baggage, you know?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind's is absolutely flabbergasted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just can't believe it. This whole time you've been in hiding while a force of great evil is tearing your city apart?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne rises to his feet, waving his hands for Master Mind say no more.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAYNE SCOTT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't want to hear about it. That's why I don't have a television in here to remind me of all the things I SHOULD be doing. Hell, I could get a wife to do that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a demented supervillain out there about to destroy our - I mean, your city.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne shrugs indifferently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're really going to do nothing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAYNE SCOTT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good and evil have a way of balancing themselves out. If this guy is as bad as you say, somebody will rise up to fight him. It's just the order of things. You found me, didn't you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne puts a condescending hand on Master Mind's shoulder

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAYNE SCOTT (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know it's hard, but you'll find someone else someday.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He then starts walking to the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're the only one who can stop him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne turns around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAYNE SCOTT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Couldn't if I wanted to. Gotta a plane to catch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A plane?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAYNE SCOTT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Going to Barbados for a little change in climate. Now, if you'll excuse me, I got to go pack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He reads the still defeated look on Master Mind's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAYNE SCOTT (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were a good foe. I'm sorry if I've let you down. If it makes a difference, you were the best foe a hero could ask for.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not smart enough to come up with a full-proof trap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAYNE SCOTT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, you did almost have me when you figured out my weakness was copper. Now that made me sweat a little. Took me way too long to drill out from under that cage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got lucky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAYNE SCOTT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anyway, it's a good thing for my sake that I could always count on you for an out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (suddenly confused)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAYNE SCOTT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C'mon, we always threw each other a couple of bones. You would always leave me an out in one of your `full-proof' traps, and I'd never had you incarcerated at a penitentiary that you couldn't eventually escape from. It kept our little game going.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind seems deflated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Game? - Was that all this ever was to you? You know, I was trying my best every time I fought you. Those `outs' as you call them were unintentional.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAYNE SCOTT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess I was never really a match for you, was I?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne shrugs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D) (thoughtfully)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then how can I expect to be one for Titan?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beaten man, Master Mind heads for the door, but stops a turns around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about Roxanne?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne unleashes an exhausted sigh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAYNE SCOTT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think we both got what we wanted out of our relationship. She got a career out of me, and I got plenty of other things out of her. But I'm ready to move on to greener pastures.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind's steel hand clinches into a fist at his side Wayne's oblivious to this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess I wasn't the villain I thought I was, and you...you weren't the hero I thought you were.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns to make his exit when he suddenly sees ROXANNE STANDING IN THE DOOR FRAME.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne is almost at a loss for words.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAYNE SCOTT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxanne! How long have you been...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Long enough.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxanne looks at Master Mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you have something else you can go do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind leaves Roxanne and Wayne facing each other in silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan emerges with Brad and Frank. He's holding a BEER CA and a bag of PORK RINDS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, I want this whole thing to look ESPN professional, understand?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A distant MECHANIZED RUMBLE can be heard. The noise rises signaling the approach of something powerful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan and his crew walk out to the center of the plaza as sound becomes almost deafening.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as it moves over the street. We PULL BACK to see a whole of TANKS rolling along the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From the five streets branching off the plaza, a dozen ta roll toward Titan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan turns to Brad and Frank.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN (CONT'D) You guys are about to get some good footage. I might need a little room, though.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brad and Frank look at each other and run to take cover behind a nearby building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meanwhile, Titan nonchalantly sips from his beer as the t begin to surround them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FEEDBACK belts out of one of the tank's loudspeaker's, causing Titan to do a mock wince.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TANK LOUDSPEAKER Titan, we have orders from the city of Metro to take you into custody. If you do not give your self up willingly, we will be forced to open fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a long pause as no one says anything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TANK LOUDSPEAKER What is your answer?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan takes a sip of his beverage and UNLEASHES A GIGANTI BURP - The shockwave of which sends several of the tanks flying into a nearby building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two of the remaining tanks close in on the villain. Both him dead to rights at point-blank range with their massiv guns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan sets down his beer, then calmly plugs a fist into e barrel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They FIRE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The FORCE OF THE BLAST SENDS THEM BOTH FLYING IN OPPOSITE DIRECTIONS where they CRASH into nearby buildings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan bends down and pick his beet back up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN (to beer) Miss me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan is suddenly bombarded by a massive barrage of machi gun fire. The force sends him flying into the windshield nearby car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks up to see an APACHE ASSAULT COPTER. It's nose- mounted GATLING-GUN is turning toward him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan gets up to his feet and looks down at his beer can. bottom of it was blown apart in the blast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Didn't mean to get you involved in all of this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He stared daggers up at the helicopter pilot just as the gets a bead on him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, man! You killed my suds!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan throws the can up and slaps it with the palm of his hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It flies with so much force it knocks the helicopter blad clean off. The rest of the Apache crashes to the street l a car dropped off a building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's one was for you, beer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan salutes the wreckage and walks away to find Brad an Frank still hiding behind the building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guys, please tell me you got that last bit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BRAD HELMS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're kidding me. I give you my sexiest moves and you mean to tell me it was for nothing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BRAD HELMS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We were afraid something might hit us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like I've given the story of the century to the wrong man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He thinks about this for a moment, then it hits him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait. What about that other reporter. Blond. Not so lumpy on the topper half, but killer legs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BRAD HELMS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxanne. You want Roxanne. She's a much better reporter than I am. You want her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where can I find her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FRANK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're actually not supposed to give out that sort of information.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BRAD HELMS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1314 Mockingbird Lane. I believe she lives in a penthouse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've been very helpful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He tosses Brad over his shoulder like a discarded ice cre cone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the faint distance we see him splash down in the middl the Metro City river.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind, pacing anxiously as Plato and Da Vinci pack boxes. Obviously Master Mind is going on the lamb.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hurry, we must be on our way as soon as possible.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DA VINCI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master, why must we flee?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told you, Titan is too powerful. If he's set on destroying us, there's precious little we could do about it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DA VINCI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are we going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To another city, someplace with a shitload of superheroes to fight. We'll start over, we'll go back to doing what we do best.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PLATO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With our tails between our legs?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The old Master Mind would never have let this comment sli by, but as we have seen, he's not the same man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plato, do you have a better plan?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind's cell phone rings. He turns in shame from hi men and answers it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello...Roxanne?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxanne paces back and forth on the phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you going to do about Tighten?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INTERCUT between Master Mind and Roxanne on phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right now I'm packing, later I'll have a snack on the train.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're running away?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In a word - yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You created this monster...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't create this - the god's of irony did and I am eating the crow I so richly deserve.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's no time for self pity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll make the time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxanne can't believe what she's hearing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can leave with us. You'll be safe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not going anywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will you listen to me, no one can stop him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have to try. The city needs your help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm afraid you have an inflated opinion of me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell's happened to you? The Master Mind I knew would never have run from a fight even though he knew deep in his heart that he didn't have a chance in hell of winning it. It was your best quality. You need to be that man right now...I...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE (heart felt)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I believe in you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind is taken aback, in a good way. But he catches himself before the words swell his heart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sweet words, but that man is dead. Please, Roxanne, just come with me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No...I guess you are a coward after all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, there's a loud crash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxanne looks up to see a huge hunk of her ceiling has be completely ripped off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan is flying above, holding the debris as casually as it were a paper plate at a barbecue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks down at her and smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Man, have I got a story for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind can hears Titan's familiar laugh from his sid the line.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxanne? Roxanne?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan is standing in front of the bowling alley, trying t decide on an appropriate pose for the occasion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What pose would be best? The corny folded arms thing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He demonstrates, arching his chin proudly in the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or maybe on the hips, like this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's the classic Superman pose, only not as masculine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, makes me look like a flamer pirate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Titan starts to fix his hair in the window, Frank pret to fix the lens on his camera as he speaks to Roxanne.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FRANK (whispering)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shouldn't we be making a run for it right about now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE (whispering)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The guy can outrun bullets. I don't think either one of us is in that kind of shape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's right, Frank.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frank looks up, stunned that Titan could have possibly he him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Also got super hearing. I promise not to keep the both of you long, but you'll thank me when this is all over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frank and Roxanne exchange helpless expressions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind reverently stares up at the painted portrait his father.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dad, it's me... (he looks around to make sure no one can hear)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Bubsy. I know we haven't talked in a while, and I'm sorry. It's been a little crazy trying to live up to a legacy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The painting's menacing stare seems to reach into his ver soul.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anyway...You raised me to be the worst that I could possibly be. And I've tried to live up to that as best as I could - even dropping out of dentistry school like you wanted me to. But I'm about to do something now that would really piss you off. I'm going to go against everything you ever taught me. I hope...I hope that maybe you'll look down at what I'm about to do as not so much a good deed, but more like the outright defiance of a hateful and ungrateful, son. If you could do that, then maybe - in your own little way - you could - for probably the first time - find a reason to be proud of me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks back up at the picture. Is it our imagination, o does the painting's stare suddenly seem even angrier?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND Well...either way, you're probably going to see me real soon. (calling over his shoulder) Men?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plato and Da Vinci suddenly stop what they're doing and l up at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PLATO AND DA VINCI Yes Sir?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND Stop packing. Our work is not finished here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PLATO AND DA VINCI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A news report shows an aerial shot of Titan setting the g ball down in the middle of a vacant city street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REPORTER We interrupt your regular afternoon programming to show you live footage of a potential dangerous situation in downtown Metro. The former hero knows as Titan is placing what appears to be a giant ball...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Da Vinci stops in front of a television set, seeing the n report in progress.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REPORTER Hold on...It appears our own Roxanne Ritchi is somehow at the scene. We now go to her with a live report.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DA VINCI Sir, I think you should see this!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxanne is standing in front of a camera with a mike in h hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm here with the cause of the destruction in Metro City. He has kidnapped me and a cameraman to chronicle what he refers to as the creation of a monument to his invincibility and overall "Asskickiness." He will use this giant concrete bowling ball to play the largest game of bowling ever using the buildings of downtown Metro City as his pins.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan suddenly steps into the shot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I'm going for the biggest strike ever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He leans into the camera.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you, Metro City, have a ringside seat as I cement my name in the anal of history.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Annals.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nevermind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan holds up the massive bowling ball, lining up his sh

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN (in quiet professional bowler announcer voice)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like Tiger before him, a young savior has come to raise a sport from the ashes. Rookie Hal Stewart, a young man with a dream, realizing that dream here today, folks. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN(cont'd)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One might click there heels and say "There's no place like home" upon finding themselves in such a fantasy. Well, Hal looks very much at home right were he is - with a ball in hand and glory in his sights.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the bowels of Master Mind's hideout, the HYDROGEN REAC glows and HUMS MENACINGLY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxanne just stand helpless as Frank films away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hal, I know everyone treated you like shit, but you don't have to do this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're right. I don't HAVE to do anything. Isn't that cool?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan lines up his shot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here's one for the record books!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan flies a few feet and rolls the ball down the main street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her face is utter horror as she watches the inevitable destruction of Metro City.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the ball rolls - it demolishes everything in it's wake cars, street lamps - windows shatter as the giant concret sphere brushes along side buildings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He smiles in anticipation and uses "body English" to dire the ball.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's nearly halfway to its target.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She closes her eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan's smile fades. He looks around as if he hears somet we don't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: About two hundred feet in front of the first building a G SPIDER WEB flies across the path of the ball, creating a defensive barrier. An enormous letter "M" is etched in th web's center.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ball breaks through the web, but it's speed is greatl reduced.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FRANK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, what's that flying in the air?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We suddenly see MASTER MIND FLYING OVER THE ROLLING BALL JET PACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He quickly pulls out his goo gun and starts laying down a path of sticky plasm to stop the destructive sphere's pat

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C'mon, slow down

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind looks down to see the meter of the gun close empty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C'mon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ball slows drastically then starts rolling to the sid It heads off an embankment and rolls harmlessly into a CA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gutterball!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's furious to say the least.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind gives him a mocking grin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bowling? What other trailer park sports can you play?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN You are becoming a real pain in my ass. I should have done this a long time ago.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan lunges at his tormentor. Master Mind hits the BOOST on his jet pack and heads back toward the other side of t city with Titan in hot pursuit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER   MIND (CONT'D) (into walkie   talkie) Plato, Da Vinci.   Secure Roxanne, he's falling for   it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A flustered Titan lands. He begins searching the city streets, but Master Mind is nowhere in sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns upon hearing an EEKING sound to his left.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sitting on the ground is a CHIMPANZEE wearing a strange collar. It smiles at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN What the hell?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From behind, Titan is immediately set upon by five more R CONTROLLED APES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The critters bite hop and hit Titan. As soon as he throws off two more jump him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan breaks free and with his mighty breath blows them across the street into a fruit stand. With Titan out of t sight they begin to attack the fruit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's a block away frantically hitting his remote.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND Shit! Stupid monkeys and their fruit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan flies away from the mad monkeys and lands to find Master Mind sitting on the ground wrapped in a long cape only his head sticking out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No more games.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan FIRES HIS LASER VISION AT MASTER MIND's CHEST.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind pulls the cloak away to reveal a FIRE HYDRANT Titan's EYE LASERS burn through the hydrant releasing a h pressure stream of water.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind uses the last remote which dumps two tons of CEMENT mix into the truck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd, police and news crews move in closer when Tita doesn't emerge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind drops his last remote and walks toward the tr cautiously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Could it really be that easy--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - BOOM - The back of the truck explodes, throwing dust an concrete everywhere. When the dust clears we see and enra Titan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Didn't think so.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the villain walks toward him, he pulls back his fist t give Master Mind the killing blow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you don't mind, I'm going to punch trough your face now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Preparing himself for the end, Master Mind shuts his eyes a SUDDEN GUST OF WIND BEGINS TO PICK UP.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AS Titan goes to strike, a BLURRY FIGURE RUNS IN AND SNAT MASTER MIND OUT OF THE AWAY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stunned, Master Mind begins to feel around his body as if make sure everything's still in place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm alive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns to see UBERMAN standing next to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uberman?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The terrified bystanders start to notice the figure stand next to Master Mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BYSTANDER 1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Uberman!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BYSTANDER 2

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uberman's alive!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BYSTANDER 3

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're saved!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the CROWD CHEERS, A confused Master Mind turns to Metr City's newly resurrected champion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: UBERMAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So did I.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He puts a hand on Master Mind's shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: UBERMAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you, old enemy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: UBERMAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Showing me the error of my ways, Showing me I'm meant to be this city's savior, showing me that, while we can try, there is no running away from our true destiny.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With that, UBERMAN IS STRICKEN BY A LASER BLAST, INSTANTL TURNING HIM INTO A CHARRED HUMAN SKELETON.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind turns to see Titan smiling with his STILL SMO EYES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh...Did I interrupt something?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind turns to run, but, suddenly Titan is before h

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where you going, buddy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan grabs Master Mind by the collar and throws him acro the street into a parked car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Welcome to Paintown. Population: you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind manages to stand on shaky legs. He seems in a daze, unable to move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan flies up in the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Time to finish this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With his fist front and center, Titan speeds toward Maste Mind. He's like a human torpedo, coming in for the killin blow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind comes to his senses and puts up his hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Titan screeches to a halt and stops just in front of him an old Warner Bros cartoon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quick joke - What's the capital of Thailand?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh - I don't know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's bang cock!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In a sudden surge of strength, MASTER MIND PUNCHES TITAN THE GROIN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The once mighty man instantly drops to his knees, searchi with tears in his eyes, for the proper word to express th pain suddenly surging through his member.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITAN (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baffled, he looks up at Master Mind's hand and sees his gauntlet is now made ENTIRELY OUT OF COPPER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, I guess pennies are good for something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He punches Titan in the face, knocking him out cold.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind looks down on Titan with more than a little pride. Suddenly he hears something behind him. He spins t see the crowd making a strange noise - APPLAUSE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxanne comes up to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd starts to go wild and cheers for Master Mind. H not sure what to make of it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pretty strange, huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're cheering for me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You saved them. You saved everybody. How's it feel?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind looks at the smiles all around him. He begins well up a little.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a...it's nice, you know? I usually don't get a lot of feedback. (whispering)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I also kind of caused all this. What happens when they find that out I was the cause of some of this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxanne looks at the cheering crowd, then back at Master Mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What they don't know won't hurt them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess that is all in the past.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're the hero.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't think I'd go that far...I mean I just...er...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND Yes?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE Stop talking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She kisses him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd erupts in a cheer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The channel 7 he channel 7 logo zooms in followed by the title "Eye on Metro City."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A picture of Master Mind smiling appears on the screen be her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SAMANTHA SUMMERS Who's bad? Well, not Master Mind. It seems the former villain has done a career 180 after defeating Tighten and saving Metro City from certain enslavement. And here he is getting a full pardon by Metro City's Mayor, Steve Dent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cut to ceremony on capital steps. The MAYOR is shaking Ma Mind's metal gauntlet when it suddenly STARTS TO CRUSH HI HAND.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MAYOR Ahhh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Secret service men quickly start to draw their weapons an take aim at Master Mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Realizing what's happening, he quickly lets the mayor's h go and puts his arms in the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND Sorry - Metal hand. Force of habit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He elbows the mayor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (CONT'D) We're okay, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wincing, the mayor signals the men to put their guns down

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WE CUT to video of Titan behind bars in a regular prison.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BRAD HELMS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And what about Tighten? Is there a prison in existence that can hold this super powered menace? Well, the answer we found is no.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A man in a white lab coat stands in front of Titan's cell just out of reach.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PRISON SCIENTIST

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course normally he could break out of there anytime, but as you can see we've taken some special precautions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The news camera pans over see Titan in his cell wearing a copper JOCK STRAP with electrical cables hooked to it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back to Samantha at the desk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BRAD HELMS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is a Hero? It seems never has that question needed to be asked more than it does tonight. We go to our very own Roxanne Ritchi, making her triumphant return to our news desk for the answer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brad turns. The camera pans over to Roxanne who we now se has been sitting beside him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROXANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is a hero? Well, there are many different kinds. There are those who hear a call, like the policeman or doctor, then there's the kind the public creates in their search for meaning and hope. Then, there are those who have the courage to change.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A woman is being chased by two large thugs. They're gaini on her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She comes to a brick wall - a dead end.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The thugs laugh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THUG #1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, gimme that purse?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (O.S)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't think it would go with your outfit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The thugs turn around to see Master Mind, standing with h arms folded across his chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THUG #2

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Master Mind!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thug #1 draws a knife.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THUG #1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So? It's not like he has any superpowers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thug #1 puts his fingers to his mouth and whistles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly two more Thugs appear behind Master Mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm gonna give you a chance to surrender.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THUG #1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Four against one. For a Master Mind, you're really bad at math.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind throws a hand signal up in the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly a giant robotic foot crashes down on the two men behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thug #1 and Thug #2 drop their knives and raise their han in the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Mind looks up and waves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Way to take out those two goons, guys!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see Da Vinci and Plato at the wheel of a gigantic robo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DA VINCI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What two goons?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The giant robot lifts its foot to check the bottom of it' sole. It KNOCKS OVER WATER TOWER in the process.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The woman looks at Master Mind, horrified.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASTER MIND (apologetically)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry, we're new at this.
